title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
efend their master.

Talk to Balthazar

We defeated the temple's shadowy defenders and found the missing Balthazar.

Find a path to the relic

We found Balthazar. He's asked us to clear the path to the relic - by any means necessary. We defeated Balthazar, but the relic is still at large. We should search for it. We encountered Balthazar - General Ketheric Thorm's advisor. He's been tasked with finding a powerful relic. He asked us to clear the path - by any means necessary.

Complete the Gauntl
